subject: fix: replace manual pagination with --paginate in extract-api.js
body:
Manual ?page=N loop was missing commits at page boundaries (6 in
canva-grid, 1 in model-pear). Switched to ghApi() helper with
gh CLI's built-in --paginate flag which follows Link headers for
reliable cursor-based traversal.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018BcCfE3cazZpUbqZZof2rz
title: replace manual pagination with --paginate in extract-api.js
